name: Brick Hill Trade Dark
description:
Made this in 2-3 hours, so yeah! An awesome Dark Mode made for this site (https://brick-hill.trade)
Based off of Dark Mode theme (https://userstyles.org/styles/172113/brick-hill-dark-mode-rock-solid) :)

Please do give this a thumbs up, I appreciate it. I also appreciate it if you give me feedback on what to fix/improve. Cya! :wave:
